p: Material from an industrial extruded profile of EN AW-6005A was investigated. This alloy was chosen, because it possesses a critical cooling rate of about 6.3 K/s [ 27, 31], which can be achieved within the DSC device that was used. Pure aluminum (99.9995% Al) was used as the reference. The chemical composition is given in Table 1. The main alloying elements possess an atomic fraction of approximately 0.63% Mg and 0.65% Si. With respect to the quasi-binary composition of Mg 2Si, the alloy 6005A therefore has an excess of Si.
